document_data.name: Enemies Abound
document_data.mainbody: '''''Enemies abound''''' was a [[spell]] that confused an enemy.
document_data.Effects: When cast, this spell caused a target creature to become confused and frightened, and subsequently unable to distinguish friend or foe. The creature randomly attacked anyone nearby. A strong-enough creature or a creature with a natural immunity to fear was unaffected by this spell.
document_data.Components: This spell required only [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components.
